scripts.postinstall: rm -rf playfab-sdk; rm -rf node_modules/playfab-sdk; mkdir playfab-sdk; cd playfab-sdk; git init; git remote add -f origin https://github.com/PlayFab/NodeSDK.git; git config core.sparseCheckout true; echo "PlayFabSDK" >> .git/info/sparse-checkout; git pull --depth=1 origin master; cd ..; npm i ./playfab-sdk/PlayFabSDK/
